entry.articleIntro: Mark Stoleson, Legatum Chief Executive Officer and Partner, met this past week with Denver Frederick, the host of radio show and podcast The Business of Giving, to discuss Legatum’s approach towards philanthropy and what it means to the business.

articleBlocks.text:
The interview focused on some of the valuable work Legatum’s network companies are doing to promote anti-slavery, health and educational initiatives. Specifically, Mark outlined to Denver the thought processes behind some of Legatum’s philanthropic endeavours, including The END Fund, The Luminos Fund, The Freedom Fund.

In the interview Denver also examined the long-term investment strategies of the firm and explored how it’s four partners have stuck together through thick and thin.

Please see below an embedded audio of the full interview. If you would like to read the accompanying transcript please click here.
